1.0.name: wordpress/jc-navigation-page
1.0.description:
JC is a small plugin. In the edit page, it displays a list of links to pages related to the page being edited: parent page, adjacent pages, child pages. This plugin is very useful on sites with many pages and saves valuable time.

more information on JC Navigation Page plugin

be more effective

We have also released an advanced plugin based on JC Navigation Page named Pronto which adds some important features :

  • also works on post and media pages.
  • search box
  • preview box of the element.
  • advanced actions : view, edit and insert into content.

For more information, visit our plugin website or Pronto page
